p:
Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) coronavirus is a highly fatal cause of lower respiratory tract infection first identified in 2012 in a Saudi Arabian man.
1 As of May, 2019, 2442 laboratory-confirmed cases of MERS and 842 (35%) associated deaths were reported across 27 countries. 2, 3 Most reported infections have been in Saudi Arabia (1983 cases and 745 [38%] deaths). 2, 3
